entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with rain showers changing to snow early this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
